/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A red building stands out against the verdant backdrop, its vibrant hue adding a splash of color to the scene. A white car is parked on the side of the road, its sleek form gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the expansive view. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the towering trees and the sprawling cityscape.
